text: Clément Armand Fallières (; 6 November 1841 – 22 June 1931) was a French statesman who was President of France from 1906 to 1913. ==References== Category:1841 births Category:1931 deaths Category:Prime ministers of France Category:Presidents of France Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Lot-et-Garonne Category:20th-century presidents of France
title: Armand Fallières
